pages.text: In this world there are diffrent types of powerful monsters with diffrent cheracteristic and ablities garding their structucture and give valuable loot once defeated . Defeat them to get emc here are all the bosses:

pages.title: Ender Dragon
pages.text: Ruler of the end which can be found at the end island when first entering  the end. After defeat it can give youdragon egg.

pages.title: Wither
pages.text: The wither can be summoned with 3 soul sand and weither head. It can fly and wither you. It will drop a neither star on death.
It can be found in the deep darkness. It is tanky and follows sound and can drop its body parts when defeated
It is a boss which can be tracked using eye of curse. When defeated it can drop 3-4 cursium ingots.
It is a boss which can be tracked using the eye of flame. When defeated it can drop a ignitium ingot.
It is a boss which can be tracked using the eye of monstrous. When defeated it can drop a infernal forge.
It is a boss which can be tracked using the eye of mecha. When defeated it can drop a block of witherite.
It is a boss which can be tracked using the eye of void. When defeated it can drop guentlet of guard.
It is a boss which can be tracked using the eye of abyss. When defeated it can drop tidal claws and the abyssal egg.
It is a boss which can be tracked using the eye of desert. When defeated it can drop a block of ancient metal.
It is a boss which can be found in the world. When defeated it drops blazing eye.
It is a boss which can be found in the world. When defeated it drops ancient anima.
It is a boss which can be found in the world. When defeated it drops obsidian heart.
It is a boss which can be found in the world. When defeated it drops void thorn.
It is a boss which can be found in ocean monoments. When defeated it drops prismerine as well as sponge.
It is a boss which can be found  underground in a structure. When defeated it drops its axe or helmet.
It is a boss which can be found in  throne in savanna groves. when killed it drops its mask.
It is a boss which can be found rarely in snowy areas. When defeated it drops ice crystal.
Farseer is a unique boss which can only be found in the far end of the world. it is incrediblely hard to get to and kill. when defeated
